revised_title: Biliary Fistula and the Secretion of Bile: Observations and Analysis
tldr: The article discusses the observations and analysis of bile secretion in cases of biliary fistula. It examines the influence of biliary fistula on digestion, nutrition, and the antiseptic action of bile. The study also investigates the effect of various drugs on biliary secretion and provides insights into the daily quantity and diurnal variation of bile flow.
